Articles.Content:
atleast is there a beta/aphla for the probes? im really eager to get it!-like jeb-the boosters look nice

Edited August 18, 2012 by darkwolfpaw54
Sure, why not. Download them in the OP. It's only the reentry probe parts, not the rover.
Pelf, why didn't you set crewCapacity on the Airlocks that aren't pods? You could do so much with them if they had (modded them myself to have the same capacity as the pod variant).
Does anybody have a design i could borrow? Stuggling to put one of these into orbit

Pelf, why didn't you set crewCapacity on the Airlocks that aren't pods? You could do so much with them if they had (modded them myself to have the same capacity as the pod variant).

I did but I guess I didn't copy them into the rar. Hotfix is now in the OP.

BTW, dunno if you already found out about it, but AFAIK you can add "Ladder" the same way you can add "Airlock", if that helps.

Don't even know how you make a collider be an airlock, so I can't give you more help:sticktongue:

Yeah, both are added in much the same way. I haven't made the handrails functional yet because I might want to change the way they're put on modules, i.e. having separate handrail parts and allowing players to attach handrails in whichever configuration they prefer. I'm not sure if I'll do that yet but I'm considering it.
I'm having trouble getting solar arrays to "line up" properly. They wont stick straight to the "axis" of the modules, always being a bit diagonal.

I'm having trouble getting solar arrays to "line up" properly. They wont stick straight to the "axis" of the modules, always being a bit diagonal.

At the right of the symmetry 'button' is the 'snap to angle - button' (top left in the VAB/SPH screen). Click on it. That will probably solve your problem.

At the right of the symmetry 'button' is the 'snap to angle - button' (top left in the VAB/SPH screen). Click on it. That will probably solve your problem.

I can't believe I didn't think of turning off snap to angle, herp derp.

Thanks
Ok, "snap to angle" being turned off still hasn't fixed the problem. I took screenshots to demonstrate my problem. It keeps switching between the two rather than going straight to the centre.

Ok, "snap to angle" being turned off still hasn't fixed the problem. I took screenshots to demonstrate my problem. It keeps switching between the two rather than going straight to the centre.

Try building it vertically, then removing it and attaching it horizontally.

Try building it vertically, then removing it and attaching it horizontally.

Thanks, that worked. I think you should probably try and find a way around having to do that though?

EDIT:

As I got a station I liked, I thought I'd share it.

Thanks, Pelf, like i said earlier, this mod will be truly awesome once we get IVA and docking

Edited August 19, 2012 by BurningSky93
It's a limitation with the editor so I on't think there's anything I can do to work around it besides building vertically. Nice station too.

It's a limitation with the editor so I on't think there's anything I can do to work around it besides building vertically. Nice station too.

Ah, that's fair enough.

And thanks, though it handles like, well, a couple of oil tankers tied together. Didn't put nearly enough RCS thrusters on it, ha!

Thanks, that worked. I think you should probably try and find a way around having to do that though?

EDIT:

As I got a station I liked, I thought I'd share it.

Thanks, Pelf, like i said earlier, this mod will be truly awesome once we get IVA and docking

How did you get that into orbit? Mine seem to fail miserably :/

Double post.

Edited August 22, 2012 by heath
Hey, you could make probes be an separate part instead of a full capsule? So we could launch it and use it. Having it as an capsule kinda doesn't works too well.
I'm not really sure what you mean.
I think he wants to launch the probe without anyone on

How did you get that into orbit? Mine seem to fail miserably :/

Hey guys, I'm having the same troublethan this dude.

I have my station but cant put it into orbit.

So could anyone be kind enough to share his own ( the actual .craft ) so I can see the way it works ? ( retroengineering ftw )
Excellent work with the atmospheric probe. Works extremely well as a sounding rocket payload, even with the heatshield facing the rocket. Need to continue to experiment with this... Keep up the work!

Hey guys, I'm having the same troublethan this dude.

I have my station but cant put it into orbit.

So could anyone be kind enough to share his own ( the actual .craft ) so I can see the way it works ? ( retroengineering ftw )

Simple really, ill explain. Hyperspace mod. Just have it (station) hovering 2-3 meters above the ground, hyperspace to hyperspace drone at 60km then fly it to your intended orbit.

How did you get that into orbit? Mine seem to fail miserably :/

Save game editing:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/7204-Fun-with-Save-File-Editing-(Instant-Orbits-for-0-14)
No... i mean, kinda... the probe, being NOT AN POD, just an part, so we could decouple it and CONTROL it, like remote tech plug.
